original_text: So the king went out from his room. He went to sit by the city's gate. People heard the news, ‘The king is sitting by the gate.’ So they all came there to listen to him.
korean_text: 왕이 일어나 성문에 앉으매 어떤 사람이 모든 백성에게 말하되 왕이 문에 앉아 계신다 하니 모든 백성이 왕 앞으로 나아오니라

sentences.original_text: So the king went out from his room.
He went to sit by the city's gate.
'The king is sitting by the gate.'
So they all came there to listen to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 모두 그에게 들으려고 그곳에 왔습니다.
